cards.title: Dense Brambles
body: The {H - 1} targets with the lowest HP are immune to damage.
At the start of the environment turn destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: The earth mother towered over the{BR}blasted trees, but nothing was{BR}visible in the forest below.

cards.title: Desolation
body: When this card enters play, each hero must discard all but 1 card, or this card deals that hero {H + 1} psychic damage.
At the end of the environment turn, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: Malichae fell to his knees, as the{BR}baying of an unearthly hound{BR}caused all hope to flee.

cards.title: Don't Stray From The Path
body: This card is indestructible.

At the start of the environment turn, if there is at least 1 other environment card in play, reveal the top card of the environment deck. If the Hound is revealed, put it into play, otherwise discard that card.
cards.flavorText: The innkeeper scowled at her. “The{BR}deeper into the woods you get, the{BR}more company you'll have.”

cards.title: Mirror Wraith
body: When this card enters play, it gains the text, keywords, and max HP of the non-character target with the lowest HP in play.
If there are no other non-character targets in play when this card enters play, this card deals each target 2 sonic damage and is destroyed.
cards.flavorText: Those that get lost in the woods{BR}sometimes return three days later and{BR}considerably hungrier.

cards.title: Old Bones
body: When this card enters play, shuffle each trash pile other than the environment and reveal a card from it. Put the revealed cards on top of each deck.
At the start of the environment turn destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “This is a place of the past. Nothing{BR}stays buried,” said Chrono-Ranger,{BR}watching the soil begin to move. “Not{BR}for long, anyways.”

cards.title: Overgrown Cathedral
body: The first time damage is dealt each turn, this card deals each target that has not been dealt damage 1 psychic damage.
At the start of the environment turn, you may destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: Once upon a time, the town of{BR}Blackwood had extended into the forest{BR}itself. Defensive magic still permeated{BR}the ruins.

cards.title: Shadow Stalker
body: At the end of the environment turn, destroy 1 ongoing card.
At the start of the environment turn this card deals each hero target {H - 2} melee damage.
Whenever an environment card is destroyed, this card deals the target with the highest HP 5 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: Darkness descended upon the{BR}bleeding heroes. One of the{BR}Blackwood’s shadows had arrived{BR}to feed.

cards.title: Shadow Weaver
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the hero with the lowest HP {H - 2} toxic damage.
When this card is destroyed, it deals each target 1 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: Vanish caught something out of the{BR}corner of her eye. “Did that tree{BR}just move?”

cards.title: The Black Tree
body: When this card enters play, place the top card of each hero and villain deck face-down beneath it. At the end of the environment turn, play a random card from beneath this one. Then if there are no cards remaining, this card is destroyed.
When this card is destroyed, discard any remaining cards beneath it.
cards.flavorText: One tree was at the center of the{BR}endless night, bent into a disconcerting{BR}yet familiar shape. As The Stranger{BR}approached, it began to glow.

cards.title: The Hound
body: When this card enters play, it deals the non-environment target with the lowest HP {H + 1} melee damage and destroys 1 hero ongoing or equipment card.
Then, play the top card of the environment deck and shuffle this card back into the environment deck.
cards.flavorText: Even outside the haunted forest, locals{BR}occasionally reported seeing an{BR}enormous hound under the full moon.

cards.title: Vengeful Spirits
body: At the start of the environment turn, shuffle the villain trash and reveal cards until a target is revealed. Put that target into play, then this card deals that target 2 infernal damage.
At the end of the environment turn, each player may discard 2 cards to destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: Mindless afterimages of the fallen{BR}flock swirled around the Matriarch.{BR}With a shrill laugh she sent them diving{BR}toward the heroes.

cards.title: Will o' the Wisp
body: Environment cards may not be played during the environment turn.
At the end of the villain turn play the top 2 cards of the environment deck.
cards.flavorText: Nightmist ignored the floating lights,{BR}pulling Ra onward. They won't take you{BR}where you want to go.'
